text: On drihtnes naman hælendes cristes, is þæt wulstan, bisceop on drihtnes naman hæfð gerædd wið his leofan gebroðra þe him getreowe synd for gode, & for worulde.

Ðæt is þonne ærest ægelwig abbot on eofesham, & Wulfwold abbot on ceortesige, & ælfsige abbot on baðan, & þa gebroðra, & Eadmund abbot on perscoran, & rawulf abbot on wincelcumbe, & Særle abbot on gleweceastre, & ælfstan decanus on wigraceastre.
Ðæt is þæt we willað georne gehyrsume beon gode, & Sancta marian, & Sancte benedicte, & us sylfe gerihtlæcan swa neah swa we nyht magon þam rihte.
And beon swa swa hit awriten is:Quasi cor unum et anima una& we willað urum woruldhlaforde Willelme cinincge, & mahthilde þære hlæfdian holde beon for gode & for worulde.
And habbe we us gerædd betweonan to ure saule þearfe, & to ealra þara gebroðra þe us underþeodde synd þe munuchades synd.
Þæt is þæt we willað beon on annesse, swylce ealle þasviimynstras syn an mynster, & beon swa hit her beforan awriten is:Quasi cor unum et anima una.
Ðæt is þæt we ælcere wucan singaniimæssan on ælcum mynstre synderlice for eallum gebroðrum, monandæge & frigedæge.
And wite se broðar þe capitula mæssewuca bið þæt þas mæssan geforðige for ða gebroðra þe libbende synd & for ælcan forðfarenan breðer.
Ælc þæra þinga fore don swylce hig ealle ætgædere on anum mynstre wæron.
& nu is þara abboda cwydrædene þæt hig willað beon gode gehyrsume & heora bisceope to heora gemænelicum þearfe.

Þæt is þæt heora ælc sceal don anCmæssan, & of his agenra handa gebycge & anCþearfendra manna gebaðige, & þa fedan, & ealle þa gescygean, & ælc singe himsylfviimæssan, & him fore donxxxnihta his mete beforan him, & ænne pænig on uppan þam mete.
God us gefultumige, þæt we hit þus motan gelæstan, & mid suman gode geeacnian.
Sic Fiat.
Ðis synd þara gebroðra naman on eofesham.

Þæt is ærest ægelwig abbot & Godric abbot, & ægelwine decanes, & Ordmær, & Godefrið, & þeodred, Regnold, & eadric, ælfwine, & eadwig, Colling, & leofwine, ælfric, & wulfwine, Sired, & bruning, ælmær, & ælfwine, ægelric, & ægelwyrd, Dunning, & Sægeat, Vhtred, & eadweard, Eadmund, Vlf, Brihtric, Wulfsige, Sexa, ælfwine, Wlmær, ægelwig.
Ðis syndon þara broðra naman on ceortesige.

Þæt is ærest wulfwold abbot, & ælfward, & Sælaf, Oter, & godwine, æþestan, & eadgar, Eadmær, & godwine, ælfwine, & benedict, Siwine, & alfwold, Brihtnoð, & ælfric, Godric, & ælfric, Oswold, & ælfric, & wulfward, & wulfrie.
Ðis syndon þara gebroðra naman on baðan.
Þæt is ærest ælfsige abbot, & ælfric, leofwig, & hieðewulf, ælfwig, & ægelmær, eadwig, & godwine, ægelwine, & oswold, ælmær, & þeodwold, eadric, ægelmær, sæwulf, þured, ægelric, & Hærlewine.
And Godric munuc on mældmes byrig ealswa ure an & ealswa wulwerd pices broðor on tantune.
